sentences.english: You have bees to thank every time you drizzle some honey into your tea.
sentences.chinese: 每次在茶中滴入蜂蜜时你都要感谢蜜蜂的馈赠。

sentences.english: In fact, this tour is the classic red and white hand-shooting game machine small bees.
sentences.chinese: 其实这款手游就是经典红白机射击游戏小蜜蜂。
蜜蜂在树篱间嗡嗡作响。

sentences.english: Bee sting on the fly out of people.
My leg smarted from the bee sting.
We need to know why honeybees are dying.
sentences.chinese: 我们需要弄清楚蜜蜂正在消亡的原因。

sentences.english: Six little black boys playing with a hive, A bumble-bee stung one, and then there were five.
sentences.chinese: 六个小黑人玩蜂巢，一个被蜜蜂蛰了就还剩下了五个。

sentences.english: Grayish quiet-dispositioned highly productive european honeybee .
sentences.chinese: 略带灰色且性情安静的欧洲蜜蜂，繁殖率高。

sentences.english: X-ray photography used to fathom such mysteries as honeybee navigation.
sentences.chinese: 用来探测像蜜蜂飞行导向这类奥秘的x光照相术。

sentences.english: The fluvalinate is one kind of high efficient acaricides for honeybee.
sentences.chinese: 氟胺氰菊酯是一种用于蜜蜂的高效杀螨剂。

sentences.english: Even cattle, which feed on alfalfa, depend on bees.
sentences.chinese: 就连以紫花苜蓿为食的牛也要依靠蜜蜂。

sentences.english: The BEE hung poised above the flower.
sentences.chinese: 蜜蜂在花的上空定住了。

sentences.english: The bee sucks honey out of the bitterest flowers.
sentences.chinese: 蜜蜂是从最苦的花朵中吸取花蜜。

sentences.english: Bees are busy working and birds are singing in the blue sky.
sentences.chinese: 蜜蜂忙着工作，小鸟在蓝天中歌唱。

sentences.english: We need to ask why the bees are more susceptible to these viruses.
sentences.chinese: 那么我们就要问，为什么蜜蜂会更容易感染这些病毒？
